docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, March 28 Twenty nations of Latin America, representing a combined population of 230 million, have agreed in principle to create a fully functioning common market no later than 1985.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, March 28 Twenty nations of Latin America, representing a combined population of 230 million, have agreed in principle to create a fully functioning common market no later than 1985.
docs.abstract: US officials rept 20 Latin-Amer nations have agreed to form common mkt by '85; reservations in agreement at Buenos Aires talks are virtually eliminated; plan calls for merging Central Amer Common Mkt and Latin Amer Free Trade Area between '70 and '80

headline.main: 20 LATIN NATIONS BACK TRADE BLOC; Presidents Likely to Adopt 1985 as Final Target Date at Parley Next Month 20 LATIN NATIONS BACK TRADE BLOC

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, March 29 The White House has been quietly asking the hat size of each of the 35 Latin-American envoys who, with their wives, will be guests of President and Mrs. Johnson in Texas this weekend.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, March 29 The White House has been quietly asking the hat size of each of the 35 Latin-American envoys who, with their wives, will be guests of President and Mrs. Johnson in Texas this weekend.
docs.abstract: Linowitz holds Latin-Amer reforms necessary not to prevent soc unrest but to spur growth and prosperity, s, Women's Natl Press Club; warns conf will not solve problems and urges US not intrude where not wanted; White House seeks hat sizes of Latin-Amer envoys, reptdly because Johnson plans gifts during visit to ranch

docs.snippet: GENEVA, March 30. A Brazilian representative said today that his Government intended to produce its own nuclear explosions "as soon as possible" for suoh peaceful purposes as creating waterways to link the basins of the Amazon and the Rio de la,...
docs.lead_paragraph: GENEVA, March 30. A Brazilian representative said today that his Government intended to produce its own nuclear explosions "as soon as possible" for suoh peaceful purposes as creating waterways to link the basins of the Amazon and the Rio de la, Plata.
docs.abstract: Brazil plans to produce own nuclear blasts to create waterway linking Amazon and Rio de la Plata basins

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, March 31 The annual report on the Alliance for Progress program says that Latin America's fight on poverty, disease, slums and illiteracy is suffering from critical weaknesses in organization and financing.
